script.description: Presentation of the character with AR glasses and drone virtual control device.
The character activates the AR glasses and the virtual drone appears.
The character controls the virtual drone with the AR glasses to perform a specific task (e.g., inspecting a structure).
Show how the character uses the virtual drone to accomplish the task with impressive visual effects thanks to the AR glasses.
The character succeeds in his task and winks at the camera, followed by the appearance of a message encouraging viewers to discover AR and virtual drone technologies.
